message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a new approach for retrieval of video segments using natural language queries, which involves using an image captioning model to construct sentential queries for visual information. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves calculating similarities between captions of adjacent images and tracking semantically similar captions over multiple frames, which suggests that it may also belong to the information retrieval (cs.IR) and multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. Finally, the paper uses a language generation model learned by neural networks to construct semantic queries, which suggests that it may also belong to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category.
